dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang
Emily Dinan
Jack Urbanek
Arthur Szlam
Douwe Kiela
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The Persona-Chat dataset consists of conversations between crowdworkers who were randomly paired and asked to act the part of a given provided persona. This dataset is designed to facilitate research into making dialogue models more consistent and engaging by endowing them with a persona.
dcterms:title: Persona-Chat

dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang
Emily Dinan
Jack Urbanek
Arthur Szlam
Douwe Kiela
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The ConvAI2 dataset is based on the Persona-Chat dataset and consists of dialogues where each speaker has assigned profiles from a set of personas. It aims to model normal conversation when two interlocutors first meet and get to know each other.
dcterms:title: ConvAI2 dataset
